answers.answer: This could be a third nerve palsy.   Does he have diabetes? or uncontrolled hypertension?Dr. O.

question: Hi i asked a question on here about my hasband problem a few days ago .Well he is seeing an eye doctor toomorrow .He has had double vision since Friday .He now has developed a droopy eye lid as well . I am worried sick about him .He did have sixth nerve palsy 4 years ago ,and it was treated with a prism on his spectacles .Have i got great concern to worry?  Thank you very much for taking the tome to read this.
title: Double vision and droppy eyelid
